contentList.content: The Nightingale treads the unseen paths, they move through shadows like the night itself. They cloaking themselves in shadow, where their arrows glide like the silent winds of night. Few know where the Nightingales come from, and even fewer sense their presenceâ€”until the final breath fades into the darkness.
Your initiative gains a +3 bonus, and you have advantage on Perception checks.
If not wearing heavy armor, the attack roll required for a critical hit is reduced by [1], based on your Wisdom <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>.
If a critical hit is landed while not wearing heavy armor, your melee weapon attack add one additional damage dice.
If a critical hit is landed while not wearing heavy armor, your ranged weapon attack add one additional damage dice.
